moves.name: Waterfall
moves.effect: Has a small chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a small chance of leaving the target confused.

moves.name: CRASH!
moves.effect: Drastically raises the user’s Attack. Raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

syncMove.name: Crashdown Aqua Jet
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is flinching.

passives.name: Racing Rain 2
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is rainy.

passives.name: Aggravation 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.
